hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Managers

Class NotificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Managers.NotificationManager

  • public class NotificationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for creating notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • createNotification

        public void createNotification(java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String message,
                               int id,
                               boolean media,
                               java.lang.String from)
        This method creates a notification.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the notification.
        message - the message of the notification.
        id - the id of the notification.
        media - if true then vibrator and sound should be used.
        from - if not null than it contains a telephone which is the user's of the message sent by.

      • createMessageNotification

        public void createMessageNotification(java.lang.String from,
                                      java.lang.String message,
                                      java.lang.String fromTel)
        This method creates a notification with a message.
        Parameters:
        from - the name of the user who sent the message.
        message - the incoming message.
        fromTel - the telephone of the user who sent the message.

      • createMoreMessageNotification

        public void createMoreMessageNotification()
        This method creates a notification with more messages.
